General.Name: Balatacilar Balatacilik Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Balatacilar Balatacilik Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells friction materials in Turkey. The company's products include brake blocks and pads for heavy vehicles, trucks, and trailers applications; brake linings for light commercial vehicles; fiber based clutch facings; and industrial friction materials for various applications. It also offers brake pads for heavy vehicles trucks and trailers applications. The company sells its products under the ERKA, Besyildiz, SAFETEX, and FiveStar brands. It exports its products to Algeria, Tunisia, Egypt, Iran, Iraq, Syria, Jordan, Macedonia, Kazakhstan, New Guinea, and Portugal. Balatacilar Balatacilik Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1988 and is based in Izmir, Turkey.
General.Address: Konak Mahallesi Cumhuriyet Bulvari, Izmir, Turkey
